xyz.fsgik.common.security

接口 FsDigest


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface FsDigest
    Denotes cipher for message digestion, maybe has a back MessageDigest.

    It is recommended to use method-chaining: 

         byte[] digestBytes = digest.prepare(bytes).bufferSize(size).digest().doFinal();
    另请参阅:
    MessageDigest

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getAlgorithm()
      Returns algorithm name.
      int getDigestLength()
      Returns digest length.
      static FsDigest getInstance(java.lang.String algorithm)
      Returns new instance of specified algorithm.
      static FsDigest getInstance(java.lang.String algorithm, java.security.Provider provider)
      Returns new instance of specified algorithm and provider.
      static FsDigest getInstance(java.lang.String algorithm, java.lang.String provider)
      Returns new instance of specified algorithm and provider.
      @Nullable java.security.MessageDigest getMessageDigest()
      Returns back MessageDigest if it has, or null if it doesn't have one.
      default CryptoProcess prepare(byte[] source)
      Prepares for source array.
      CryptoProcess prepare(byte[] source, int offset, int length)
      Prepares for source array of specified length from offset index.
      CryptoProcess prepare(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
      Prepares for source buffer.
      CryptoProcess prepare(java.io.InputStream source)
      Prepares for source stream.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        static FsDigest getInstance(java.lang.String algorithm)
        Returns new instance of specified algorithm. Returned instance has a back thread-local MessageDigest which supplied with MessageDigest.getInstance(String).
        参数:
        algorithm - specified algorithm
        返回:
        new instance of specified algorithm

      • getInstance

        static FsDigest getInstance(java.lang.String algorithm,
                            java.lang.String provider)
        Returns new instance of specified algorithm and provider. Returned instance has a back thread-local MessageDigest which supplied with MessageDigest.getInstance(String, String).
        参数:
        algorithm - specified algorithm
        provider - specified provider
        返回:
        new instance of specified algorithm

      • getInstance

        static FsDigest getInstance(java.lang.String algorithm,
                            java.security.Provider provider)
        Returns new instance of specified algorithm and provider. Returned instance has a back thread-local which supplied with MessageDigest.getInstance(String, Provider).
        参数:
        algorithm - specified algorithm
        provider - specified provider
        返回:
        new instance of specified algorithm

      • getMessageDigest

        @Nullable
@Nullable java.security.MessageDigest getMessageDigest()
        Returns back MessageDigest if it has, or null if it doesn't have one. The back MessageDigest maybe thread-local, that is, returned value may be not only one instance.
        返回:
        back MessageDigest if it has, or null if it doesn't have one

      • getDigestLength

        int getDigestLength()
        Returns digest length.
        返回:
        digest length

      • prepare

        default CryptoProcess prepare(byte[] source)
        Prepares for source array.
        参数:
        source - source array
        返回:
        prepared process

      • prepare

        CryptoProcess prepare(byte[] source,
                      int offset,
                      int length)
        Prepares for source array of specified length from offset index.
        参数:
        source - source array
        offset - offset index
        length - specified length
        返回:
        prepared process

      • prepare

        CryptoProcess prepare(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
        Prepares for source buffer.
        参数:
        source - source buffer
        返回:
        prepared process

      • prepare

        CryptoProcess prepare(java.io.InputStream source)
        Prepares for source stream.
        参数:
        source - source stream
        返回:
        prepared process

      • getAlgorithm

        java.lang.String getAlgorithm()
        Returns algorithm name.
        返回:
        algorithm name
